answerText: Tyrone family [or the Tyrones][10] Members of the Tyrone family are the central players in this play that all takes place on one August 1912 day in the Connecticut summer home of the Tyrones.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 7 | 12 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One member of this family has just returned from being treated for morphine addiction.  [10]  Name this family that consists of father James, mother Mary, and sons Jamie and Edmond, who are constantly fighting with one another in the family's living room.
